On Wed, Oct 23, 2024 at 10:23 PM Anil Kumar ( Sr. Mgr. IT ) <anil.kumar@renewbuy.com> wrote:


Dear Team,

 

Is there Any option to uninstall client from DLP console if available please share step with us.
 






	
		
			
			Anil Kumar

			Sr. Manager - ICT
			
			
			 
			
		
		
			
			T : 0124- 6403862

			M: +91 8890178060
			E : anil.kumar@renewbuy.com
			
			 
		
		
			 
			 
		
	








 

 

On Wed, 23 Oct 2024 at 6:45 PM, Netwrix Support <techsupport@netwrix.com> wrote:


Hi Anil,

The allocation of the licenses is made automatically and the reason for this is in order not to use the licenses on more systems than the number of licenses.
If you want to allocate the licenses to a specific group - you first need to make sure that you have enough free licenses (400  in your case).
If licenses are not available you first need to uninstall the clients from the computers which you want to decommission, obtain the number of free licenses that you need and only then install the client on the group of computers where you want to redirect the available licenses.

Best regards,

Adrian Draghici |Technical Support Team Lead (EMEA/Asia/Aus)

Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
